text.text: WHAT: Summarize findings or highlights from the Assess and Strategize sections of ERB.

WHY: Assess section key takeaways record results from the collaborative assessment of hazards, equity, and resilience in your community. Strategize section key takeaways document the actions for building equitable resilience that were agreed upon in the workshop and what next steps and commitments for implementing action are.

HOW: The last page of each section is a Reflection and Next Steps page. On this page, look for the link to the Key Takeaways form next to the clipboard icon on the What youâ€™ll need part of the page. Get together with the core team to respond to the questions and input your answers into the form. You can find your answers and download them using MyPortfolio.
